__e: I'm tellin' ya, girl, you've been ready to jump ship for months.

You didn't have to come all the way over here just to drop the case.
He's not going to recuse himself.
Or the judge is going to see the light and throw the case out--
- You think I should abandon my brother?
It's not necessary to leave the world, my son but rather to live in the world and to love the objects of the world not for themselves alone, but for what there is in them of God.
I thought the point of quitting your other job was to start a business.
That's your idea of being a real dad abandoning me and moving to Hawaii.
Only if you abandon your wife when she needs you the most.
I came to find out what made you catch a train, abandon your house and leave your husband without saying a word.

I had to drop out of school but I want to give it my best shot.
- Joke all you want, but it's either this or drop out of school.
Captain must never abandon his ship.
You now have one minute to abandon ship.
This is the captain, all hands abandon ship.
I have a right to know what makes her so great that you'd give up your family.
I am here for you, but just because you've found a new family doesn't mean you throw the old one away.
- Giving up the home your mother brought you into the world in - 'Cause it's what she wanted for me, isn't it?
